text:
[Verse]
Stars above shine bright
In the quiet of the night
Feel the moon's soft light
Everything just feels right

[Verse 2]
Whispers in the breeze
Leaves dance with ease
Heart feels at peace
Underneath the trees

[Chorus]
Starry nights calling
Under skies we're falling
All our dreams unfolding
In this moment
Golden

[Verse 3]
Crickets sing their song
In the night so long
Together we belong
Where we can’t go wrong

[Bridge]
Time stands still
Every breath a thrill
Heartbeats never chill
Dreams they always will

[Chorus]
Starry nights calling
Under skies we're falling
All our dreams unfolding
In this moment
Golden
title: Starry Nights
